name: Mixed Up
description:
2.5cmW Bias Binding. 

I've combined my love of Bias Binding with my love of creating & can now offer you a selection of handmade Bias Binding created by me here in my Spearwood Studio.

All my Bias Binding has been pre-washed to eliminate any shrinkage. 

Each Mixed Up Pack of Bias Binding consists of 2 different fabrics @ 1m each fabric [total 2m]. 
Your Binding will arrive on an Eco-friendly card Spool which is ideal for REuse.

All fabrics are 100% cotton with the exception of the polyester Lace Binding.

***In order to receive the correct postage/shipping costs please select the country in which your parcel is to be posted to during Checkout.

name: Bias Binding - Lace
description:
I've combined my love of Bias Binding with my love of creating and can now offer you a selection of handmade Bias Binding created by me here in my Spearwood Studio.

Shimmery Wedding White polyester Floral Lace 2.5cmW single fold Bias Binding.

All my Bias Binding has been pre-washed to eliminate any shrinkage. 

Examples of use for this Bias Binding is as a feature visible on the outside of the garment or as a false hem turned to the inside of a garment so not visible.

Sold in 1m increments @ $3.50 per metre.
Choose the amount you desire in Checkout.

When in Checkout please select the country you are in and then Up-date the total to receive postage costs.

Click on the images to view in more detail.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
Jody - jodypearl@westnet.com.au

name: Piece of Cake Frock & Tunic Pattern
description:
Relaxed fit, easy wear, sleeveless, shaped Empire-lIne Dress in 2 lengths ie. Frock & Tunic. Featuring Boat-neck styled Front Bodice and Cut-away back, with 2 comfort pleats in the front of the A-line skirt section. 
A versatile A-line silhouette allows you to play with combining fabrics and trims. Great for layering, means you can wear this garment all year round 
The pattern package contains full sized patterns in 5 sizes (8-18) and an instruction booklet for creating both lengths.
This pattern is suitable for REinvention applications.

At Checkout please choose the country you wish the pattern to be sent to and up-date the total to receive postage cost.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
Jody - jodypearl@westnet.com.au

name: Splice Skirt Pattern
description:
2 or more layers of fabric create a relaxed fit, flared A-line Skirt which sits around the midriff, with side zip and bias tape waist.

The pattern package contains full size paper patterns and a detailed Instruction Booklet for 2 skirt variations ie. Vertical & Horizontal,  which refers to the stitching & cutting lines, in your choice of size.

To determine the size pattern you would like, measure just below your waistline and choose from the Options listed below. 

A fabulous project to extend existing sewing skills and create a unique garment.

At Checkout please choose the country you wish the pattern to be sent to and up-date the total to receive postage cost.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
Jody - jodypearl@westnet.com.au

name: Change of Heart Skirt Pattern
description:
Semi-fitted A-line Skirt with a relaxed fall attached to a reversible Front Panel.
It is 2 skirts in 1 - when you get tired of one look just flip it round to reveal a totally new look!
A great project to extend beginner to advanced sewing skills and also lends itself to REinvention applications. 
The pattern package contains a full sized pattern in 6 sizes (8-18) and detailed instruction booklet.

At Checkout please choose the country you wish the pattern to be sent to and up-date the total to receive postage cost.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
Jody - jodypearl@westnet.com.au
